snippet.title: Embers Adrift - Gritty Gameplay with Elloa & Drindin EP1
snippet.description:
🎮 Embers Adrift - An immersive group-based MMORPG focused on challenge & community. Ignite your adventure!

🎥 Gritty Gameplay with Elloa & Drindin: a serie of gameplay footage videos to introduce you to our game in depth.
Ask all of your questions in the comments & check our other episodes!
Alpha footage - dec 2021

✅ FOLLOW US
http://www.embersadrift.com
https://www.facebook.com/EmbersAdrift
https://twitter.com/EmbersAdrift
http://www.twitch.tv/EmbersAdrift

✅ DISCORD
